thread.title: Arapahoe County deputies investigating homicide in Centennial
thread.title_full: Arapahoe County deputies investigating homicide in Centennial

author: Jesse Paul
title: Arapahoe County deputies investigating homicide in Centennial
text:
Arapahoe County sheriff’s deputies are investigating a fatal shooting Wednesday morning in Centennial.
The killing happened in the area of the 7000 block of South Jordan Road. That’s just southeast of the East Arapahoe Road and Jordan Road intersection.
The county sheriff’s office said it initially responded to the area after receiving reports of gunshots being fired.
We are working a shots fired call at the 7000-block of South Jordan Road. PIO enroute. Updates here as info becomes available.
— Arapahoe Sheriff (@ArapahoeSO) March 22, 2017 

Authorities say a suspect in the shooting “possibly left (the) area in an older white sedan.”
The suspect is described as a white man wearing a gray or white sleeveless T-shirt, jeans and a black baseball hat turned backwards. He also has a large tattoo on his upper right arm.
This is a developing story that will be updated as more information becomes available.
